lead_paragraph: A federal bankruptcy court judge will issue what the owners of Atlantic City's Trump Taj Mahal Casino Resort consider a life-or-death decision on Friday for the troubled gambling hall.

headline.main: Icahn Aide: Taj Has to Close if Union Pact Remains
headline.print_headline: Icahn Aide: Taj Has to Close if Union Pact Remains
